short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the persistent and intrusive Glowforge Premium ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With a single click, hide the "Premium" ad buttons on the current page when in the Glowforge app. App is *very* simple (and naive). All code is visible in this Github Repo: https://github.com/neeler/gf-hide-premium.
